/usr/bin/g++-7  -std=c++1z -Wall -fPIC -g -O0 -Wall -ggdb -gdwarf-3 -O0 -ggdb -gdwarf-3 -D_DEBUG -ggdb -gdwarf-3 -D_DEBUG  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/rdma_for_ml.dir/rdma_for_ml.cpp.o  -o rdma_for_ml -Wl,-rpath,/home/lorenzo/derecho/build:/usr/local/lib ../../../libderecho.so.0.9.1 -lrdmacm -libverbs -lrt -lpthread -latomic -lstdc++fs /usr/local/lib/libfabric.so -L/usr/local/lib -lmutils -L/usr/local/lib -lmutils-tasks
